definition: ancient banquet game of throwing arrows into a pot, the winner determined by the number of arrows thrown in, and the loser required to drink as punishment
to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of

sentences.english: Tau Hu differs from archery in forms, but coincides in inner spirit.
sentences.chinese: 投壶与射礼的外在形式虽不同，内在精神却一致。

sentences.english: The second part is to study the cultural function of Touhu game.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分是对投壶游戏文化功能的探讨。

sentences.english: In the late Warring State period, Touhu has revealed the trend of breakthrough the limitation of etiquette.
sentences.chinese: 战国末期，投壶游戏已显露出突破礼仪限制的趋势。

sentences.english: The third part is the recurrence of Touhu in modern age.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是投壶游戏的现代回归情况。

sentences.english: From Han Dynasty to Sui-Tang and Five Dynasties, the entertainment of Touhu has become prominent gradually.
sentences.chinese: 两汉至隋唐五代时期，此期投壶的娱乐性逐渐凸显。

definition: drinking game where one has to guess the number of small objects in the other player's closed hand
chip on which tallies are recording during a drinking game
jade pot for cold water/curling (sport)/curling puck
throwing the embroidered ball (traditional Zhuang flirting game at festivals)/(fig.) to make overtures/to court
